48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:When a matter would worry the Prophet (ﷺ), he would raise his head up toward the sky and say: “Glory is to Allah, the Magnificent (Subḥān Allāhil-`Aẓīm).” And when he would strive in supplication; he would say: “O the Living, O Sustainer (Yā Ḥayyu yā Qayyūm).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَا يَقُولُ عِنْدَ الْكَرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What One Says In Times of Distress
